Text:
Just in cased there is any confusion, this is *not* the Zhang Yimou 2002 film 'Hero' aka 'Ying Xiong'. It's this 1997 Corey Yuen film:

Ma Wing Ching (1997)

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0136242/
can you re seed this please
Why would you use RMVB files when most of us don't use Realplayer? We'll also need VirtualDubMod to covert these files to avi or dvd
